website_summaries.verdict: This highly rated roller with serum provides the benefits of co-enzyme Q10 (CoQ10) with peptides for clinically demonstrated reduction in under-eye puffiness and dark circles.
pros: Serum contains co-enzyme Q10 with peptides for demonstrated reduction of capillary permeability, which reduces dark circles under eyes
Clinically proven to be effective for addressing under-eye puffiness and dark circles
cons: More expensive than most other rollers with serums

customer_reviews.title: Flakey Mess
customer_reviews.text: While this product was effective in reducing morning baggy eyes, it rolled up in flakes under my makeup. I was told recently, after-the-fact by a dermatologist, that some products actually use glue in their ingredients to achieve the skin tightening effect. While I don't know if that's the case with this product (ingredient list was too small to read) -I won't be re-ordering since I was a flakey mess.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Irvin

customer_reviews.title: The roller is super cooling to my under eye bags and I feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this eye gel so far!! The roller is super cooling to my under eye bags and I feel it reduces them and tightens it up after I apply the gel. This is helpful since I have a baby that doesn’t like to sleep through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective!
customer_reviews.text: This product absolutely does NOT work. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Tina K

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing 4th one (keep one in my travel bag, 1 in my vacation home ). Use this on my eyes in the morning & at night. Very impressed & would recommend
customer_reviews.author: SoFee

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of it. I keep mine in the fridge which enhances the feeling even more!
customer_reviews.author: Susan P. Blevins

customer_reviews.title: It works for me!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It really reduces the bags under my eyes in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C.

customer_reviews.title: Effective!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this feels as it gently rolls away the puffiness under my eyes. Great to use when I've been out too late or had a bad night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: S. L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Put it on after all make up is on then fan dry it.
customer_reviews.author: holly go

customer_reviews.title: Reduces puffiness on under eye bags
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it daily on my under eye bags. Works great. Helps reduce the puffiness.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this a week. Love the applicator and the feel of the product, but honestly I am not seeing any results as of yet. I am hopeful though.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L Rejon

customer_reviews.title: I don’t have horrible bags but this helps the bags I do have
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have horrible bags but this helps the bags I do have. Price is very good for the product finish.
customer_reviews.author: EM1CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this 3 times and I’ve noticed a difference. My eyes are less puffy and there’s no darkness under my eyes. I’m so happy with my results.
customer_reviews.author: Horn

customer_reviews.title: I like a product a lot and it works
customer_reviews.text: I like a product a lot and it works. But the container gives me a lot of problems. The pumping mechanism doesn’t work properly and I have to open the container every time to get product out. Not the way it should work.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Planey

product_meta.title: Clinical Difference Pack Your Bags Refreshing Anti-Puff Eye Gel Roller Pen with CoQ 10 and Peptides: Treatment for Dark Undereye Circles and Puffy Eyes
